word_mean: 途径，道：特别指达到一个特殊目的所遵循的途径。在神经病学，指把感觉印象导向大脑皮质的神经结构(传入途径)或把脉冲由大脑通至骨骼肌和神经结构(传出途径)，另见path。又单独用于表明由一种生物活性物质转变成另一种生物活性物质的反应顺序(代谢途径)

sentence.Network_en: Diplomacy will smooth your pathway to success.
sentence.Network_cn: 为人圆通会让你成功的道路通畅无阻。

sentence.Network_en: During childhood each of us has to navigate a pathway through a series of developmental stages.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们每个人在童年时都要经历和应对不同的成长阶段。

sentence.Network_en: Richard was coming up the pathway.
sentence.Network_cn: 理查德正沿着小路走过来。

list.abs: 由视神经通路(neural pathway)可以看出:每只眼球内视网膜(retina)的左半边,均经由视神经通路,与左半球的视觉区连接. 这说明左半球.

糖酵解途径（glycolytic pathway）是指细胞在胞浆中分解葡萄糖生成丙酮酸（pyruvate）的过程，此过程中伴有少量ATP的生成。
临床路径（clinical pathway）（Clinical pathway）是指针对某一疾病建立一套标准化治疗模式与治疗程序，是一个有关临床治疗的综合模式，以循证医学 …

entry.def: A pathway is a path which you can walk along or a route which you can take.

example.ex: Richard was coming up the pathway.
example.tran: 理查德正沿着小路走过来。

example.ex: ...a pathway leading towards the nearby river.

entry.def: A pathway is a particular course of action or a way of achieving something.

example.ex: Diplomacy will smooth your pathway to success.
example.tran: 为人圆通会让你成功的道路通畅无阻。

example.ex: ... the call to arms that opened the pathway to freedom for the Brazilian people.
example.tran: 为巴西人民开启了自由之路的武装起来的号召

means.word_mean: 1. a bundle of mylenated nerve fibers following a path through the brain
